channel.title: PI Curse prayers question
channel.description:
Well, following a tut that I googled and found on R-S, I added curse prayers to my PI server. The 80% curse prayers one.
Well, I've finished the tut with no errors but I'm wondering.. how exactly do i turn on the curse prayers lol? Where do people switch prayer books.

item.title: PI Curse prayers question
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

[quote=“neonscapeftw, post:4, topic:383728”]Well, how i have it on my server is there is a comand ::prayer, This toggles the prayer book to the curse one, this is the code i have for it:
if (playerCommand.startsWith(“prayer”) && c.playerRights >= 1 && c.memberStatus >= 1) {
if (c.inWild())
return;
c.setSidebarInterface(5, 22500);
}
c.setSidebarInterface(5, 22500); <-- 22500 is the interface ID you added in RSInterface.java in the client, it might be different for you, but most the time it is 22500.
You could also add this to clickobject, same sort of code.

Hope this helps :)[/quote]

A command, really?

Add this into your actionhandler:


		case 13193:
			if(c.altarPrayed == 0) {
				c.altarPrayed = 1;
				c.setSidebarInterface(5, 22500);
				c.startAnimation(645);
				c.sendMessage("You sense a surge of power flow through your body!");
				c.getCombat().resetPrayers();
				c.getCurse().resetCurse();
			} else {
				c.altarPrayed = 0;
				c.setSidebarInterface(5, 5608);
				c.startAnimation(645);
				c.sendMessage("You sense a surge of purity flow through your body!");
 				c.getCurse().resetCurse();
				c.getCombat().resetPrayers();
			}
		break;

change the case to the altar id.
Im not sure if thats the correct one.

Read full topic

item.title: PI Curse prayers question
item.dc:creator: @neonscapeftw neonscapeftw
item.description:
@neonscapeftw wrote:

Well, how i have it on my server is there is a comand ::prayer, This toggles the prayer book to the curse one, this is the code i have for it:
if (playerCommand.startsWith(“prayer”) && c.playerRights >= 1 && c.memberStatus >= 1) {
if (c.inWild())
return;
c.setSidebarInterface(5, 22500);
}
c.setSidebarInterface(5, 22500); <-- 22500 is the interface ID you added in RSInterface.java in the client, it might be different for you, but most the time it is 22500.
You could also add this to clickobject, same sort of code.

Hope this helps

Read full topic

item.title: PI Curse prayers question
item.dc:creator: @tarheels tarheels
item.description:
@tarheels wrote:

Most people have made a secondary alter that you pray at and it switches from normal prayers to curses
